hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select b_date,b_time,e_time,user_id,blueprntcd from calendar where b_date BETWEEN GETDATE() and GETDATE()+14
select count(*) from (select b_date,b_time,e_time,user_id,blueprntcd from calendar where b_date BETWEEN GETDATE() and GETDATE()+14) wmTempTable
insert into prscrpdt( [prscrp_no] ,[patient_no] ,[drugdesc],[drugcode]) values(:t_presscno,:t_patientNo,:t_drugdesc,:t_drugcode)
SELECT blp_id,longname FROM [dbo].[blueprnt] where blptype = 'CONSULT'
select count(*) from (SELECT blp_id,longname FROM [dbo].[blueprnt] where blptype = 'CONSULT') wmTempTable
select patient_no from ptdetail where medicareno = :t_medicareno
select count(*) from (select patient_no from ptdetail where medicareno = :t_medicareno) wmTempTable
select patient_no,role from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass
select count(*) from (select patient_no,role from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass) wmTempTable

select r.b_date,r.b_time,r.e_time,r.user_id,r.blueprntcd,b.locatn1_id,r.duration from rosterslots r, roster b, resource res where r.roster_id = b.roster_id and res.resorce_id = b.locatn1_id and (b.rostrdate BETWEEN GETDATE() and GETDATE()+14) and res.typedetl = 'OUT'

select count(*) from (select r.b_date,r.b_time,r.e_time,r.user_id,r.blueprntcd,b.locatn1_id,r.duration from rosterslots r, roster b, resource res where r.roster_id = b.roster_id and res.resorce_id = b.locatn1_id and (b.rostrdate BETWEEN GETDATE() and GETDATE()+14) and res.typedetl = 'OUT') wmTempTable

update ptdetail_reg set famDrTitle = :t_famdrtitle, famDrGiven = :t_famdrgiven, famDrSurname = :t_famdrSurname, famDrProviderNo = :t_famdrProNo, famDrMedicareCenter = :t_famdrMedCenter, famDrAdr1 = :t_famdrAdd1, famDrAdr2 = :t_famdrAdd2, famDrSuburb = :t_famdrsuburb, famDrState = :t_famdrstate, famDrPostCode = :t_famdrpostcode, refDrTitle = :t_refdrtitle, refDrGiven = :t_refdrgiven, refDrSurname = :t_refdrSurname, refDrProviderNo = :t_refdrProNo, refDrMedicareCenter = :t_refdrMedCenter, refDrAdr1 = :t_refdrAdd1, refDrAdr2 = :t_refdrAdd2, refDrSuburb = :t_refdrsuburb, refDrState = :t_refdrstate, refDrPostCode = :t_refdrpostcode, nokGiven = :t_nokgiven, nokSUrname = :t_noksurname, nokRelationship = :t_nokrelationship, nokContactNo = :t_nokcontactno, sigText = :t_sigText, base64ImageUrl = :t_base64imageurl where patient_no = :t_patientno
select case when count(ID)>0 then 'true' when count(ID)=0 then 'false' end as dataExist from JSONTextTemp where email = :t_patientno
select count(*) from (select case when count(ID)>0 then 'true' when count(ID)=0 then 'false' end as dataExist from JSONTextTemp where email = :t_patientno) wmTempTable
update ptsms set readinpp = 1 where messageid = :messageid
select * from ptdetail_reg where ptStatus = 'MEDICARE_NO_VERIFIED' and ptdetailStatus is null
select count(*) from (select * from ptdetail_reg where ptStatus = 'MEDICARE_NO_VERIFIED' and ptdetailStatus is null) wmTempTable

update ptdetail_reg set famDrTitle = :t_famdrtitle, famDrGiven = :t_famdrgiven, famDrSurname = :t_famdrSurname, famDrProviderNo = :t_famdrProNo, famDrMedicareCenter = :t_famdrMedCenter, famDrAdr1 = :t_famdrAdd1, famDrAdr2 = :t_famdrAdd2, famDrSuburb = :t_famdrsuburb, famDrState = :t_famdrstate, famDrPostCode = :t_famdrpostcode, refDrTitle = :t_refdrtitle, refDrGiven = :t_refdrgiven, refDrSurname = :t_refdrSurname, refDrProviderNo = :t_refdrProNo, refDrMedicareCenter = :t_refdrMedCenter, refDrAdr1 = :t_refdrAdd1, refDrAdr2 = :t_refdrAdd2, refDrSuburb = :t_refdrsuburb, refDrState = :t_refdrstate, refDrPostCode = :t_refdrpostcode, nokGiven = :t_nokgiven, nokSUrname = :t_noksurname, nokRelationship = :t_nokrelationship, nokContactNo = :t_nokcontactno, sigText = :t_sigText, base64ImageUrl = :t_base64imageurl where email = :t_email

select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat, res.title,res.given, res.surname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id where cal.patient_no = :patientno and cal.b_date < :today and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR'

select count(*) from (select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat, res.title,res.given, res.surname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id where cal.patient_no = :patientno and cal.b_date < :today and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR') wmTempTable
select * from preandpostcomms where commstype = 'EMAIL' and commmainid =:commmainid
select count(*) from (select * from preandpostcomms where commstype = 'EMAIL' and commmainid =:commmainid) wmTempTable
update x0152578 set patient_no = :patientNo where userid = :email
select * from refrlsrc
select count(*) from (select * from refrlsrc) wmTempTable
update ptdetail_reg set ptdetailStatus=:t_ptdetailStatus,patient_no = :t_patientno where idno =:t_idno
select code,[desc] from country where [desc] = :countryName
select count(*) from (select code,[desc] from country where [desc] = :countryName) wmTempTable
select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass
select count(*) from (select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass) wmTempTable

update account set ac_name= :t_ac_name, accescode = :t_accescode, contact = :t_contact, phone_ah = :t_phone_ah, phone_bh = :t_phone_bh, address1 = :t_address1, address2 = :t_address2, suburb = :t_suburb, state =:t_state, postcode = :t_postcode where accountno = :t_accountno
select fundcode,fundbrndid,company from hlthfund
select count(*) from (select fundcode,fundbrndid,company from hlthfund) wmTempTable
select * from NoGenCon where idCode = :t_idCode
select count(*) from (select * from NoGenCon where idCode = :t_idCode) wmTempTable
select * from x0152578 where userid = :t_username and password = :t_pass
select count(*) from (select * from x0152578 where userid = :t_username and password = :t_pass) wmTempTable
select report_dte,report_tme,srvcno,status,report_txt,mobileno,messageid,replymsgid,sms_inoout,readinpp from ptsms where patient_no = :t_patientno and msg_type = 'EMAIL'

select count(*) from (select report_dte,report_tme,srvcno,status,report_txt,mobileno,messageid,replymsgid,sms_inoout,readinpp from ptsms where patient_no = :t_patientno and msg_type = 'EMAIL') wmTempTable

SELECT details,treatmnt,tests,date,d.title,d.given,d.surname FROM ptinddet r inner join doctor d on r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id where masticode = 'RECALLS' and [date] > GETDATE() and patient_no = :patientNo

select count(*) from (SELECT details,treatmnt,tests,date,d.title,d.given,d.surname FROM ptinddet r inner join doctor d on r.doctor_id = d.doctor_id where masticode = 'RECALLS' and [date] > GETDATE() and patient_no = :patientNo) wmTempTable
select * from JSONTextTemp where isFormComplete = 1
select count(*) from (select * from JSONTextTemp where isFormComplete = 1) wmTempTable

insert into preandpostcomms(commmainid,shortname,longname,heading,commstype,whn2trigd,trgfromwhn,whn2trigt,mesge2send) values(:commmainid,:shortname,:longname,:heading,:commstype,:whn2trigd,:trgfromwhn,:whn2trigt,:mesge2send)
insert into ptcharacters(patient_no,midname,agiven) values(:t_patientNo,:t_midname,:t_preferredName)
insert into prscrphd([prscrp_no], [patient_no] ,[doctor_id] ,[date] ,[adminuse] ,[patndetls]) values(:t_resxtiptionno,:t_patientno,:t_doctorid,:t_date,:t_adminuse,:t_patndetls)
select surname,resorce_id from Resource WHERE resrcetype = 'LOCATION' AND INVALIDREC =0
select count(*) from (select surname,resorce_id from Resource WHERE resrcetype = 'LOCATION' AND INVALIDREC =0) wmTempTable

insert into calendar(uniqcalid,b_date,b_time,user_id,[last],[first],title,medicareno,bday,patient_no,apmadeon,apmadeat,apmadeby,resorce_id,cal_desc,opnotes,blueprntcd,e_time,duration,color) VALUES(:uniqcalid,:b_date,:b_time,:user_id,:last,:first,:title,:medicareno,:bday,:patient_no,:apmadeon,:apmadeat,:apmadeby,:resorce_id,:cal_desc,:opnotes,:blueprntcd,:e_time,:duration,:color)
select count(messageid) as unreadsms from ptsms where readinpp=0 and patient_no = :patientno
select count(*) from (select count(messageid) as unreadsms from ptsms where readinpp=0 and patient_no = :patientno) wmTempTable
select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass
select count(*) from (select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid and password = :t_pass) wmTempTable

update ptdetail set title = :t_title, given = :t_given, surname = :t_surname, address1 = :t_address1, address2 = :t_address2, suburb=:t_suburb, postcode=:t_postcode, state = :t_state, phone_ah=:t_phone_ah, phone_bh=:t_phone_bh, mobile=rtrim(:t_mobile+' '), dob = :t_dob, medicareno = :t_medicareno, member_no=:t_member_no, email = :t_email, fundcode = :t_fundcode, birthplace=:t_birthplace, vetaffno=:t_vetafno, referalsrc=:t_refRalSrc, mediexpry=:t_medExpiry, mcare_refn=:t_mcareRefNo, claimdtls=:t_claimDetails, feepositn =:t_feepositn, datejoined=:t_dateJoined, dvacardtyp = :t_dvacardtype, allergies = :t_allergies, accountno = :t_accountNo, nextofkin=:t_nextofkin where patient_no = :t_patient_no

select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat, res.title,res.given, res.surname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id where cal.patient_no = :patientno and cal.b_date >= :today and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR'

select count(*) from (select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat, res.title,res.given, res.surname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id where cal.patient_no = :patientno and cal.b_date >= :today and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR') wmTempTable
delete from ptdetail_reg where idno = :idno

Select r.resorce_id,r.Title,r.given,r.surname, r.Idno,r.usualdurtn,r.schedlr_id,r.sortorder,d.specialty1 from RESOURCE r left join doctor d on r.resorce_id= d.resorce_id Where r.resrcetype='DOCTOR' and r.notincalnd=0 and r.INVALIDREC=0 and r.schedlr_id > ' ' and r.showinpp = 'true'

select count(*) from (Select r.resorce_id,r.Title,r.given,r.surname, r.Idno,r.usualdurtn,r.schedlr_id,r.sortorder,d.specialty1 from RESOURCE r left join doctor d on r.resorce_id= d.resorce_id Where r.resrcetype='DOCTOR' and r.notincalnd=0 and r.INVALIDREC=0 and r.schedlr_id > ' ' and r.showinpp = 'true') wmTempTable

select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, pt.sex, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptreg.idno as ptregidno, lg.IdNo as loginid, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no left join x0152578 lg on pt.patient_no = lg.patient_no where userid = :t_username and password = :t_pass

select count(*) from (select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, pt.sex, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptreg.idno as ptregidno, lg.IdNo as loginid, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no left join x0152578 lg on pt.patient_no = lg.patient_no where userid = :t_username and password = :t_pass) wmTempTable

select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat,opnotes, res.title,res.given, res.surname,blueprntcd,blp.longname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id left join blueprnt blp on cal.blueprntcd = blp.shortname where cal.patient_no = :patientno and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR'

select count(*) from (select b_date,b_time,e_time,cal_desc, apmadeon,apmadeat,opnotes, res.title,res.given, res.surname,blueprntcd,blp.longname from calendar cal left join resource res on cal.user_id = res. schedlr_id left join blueprnt blp on cal.blueprntcd = blp.shortname where cal.patient_no = :patientno and res.resrcetype = 'DOCTOR') wmTempTable

select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no where pt.patient_no = :t_patientno

select count(*) from (select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no where pt.patient_no = :t_patientno) wmTempTable
select * from clinCatDat where code = :t_code
select count(*) from (select * from clinCatDat where code = :t_code) wmTempTable

select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no left join x0152578 on x0152578.patient_no = pt.patient_no where x0152578.userid = :t_username and x0152578.password = :t_pass and ptreg.medicareno = :t_medicareno

select count(*) from (select pt.patient_no, pt.title, pt.given, pt.surname, pt.address1, pt.address2, pt.suburb, pt.postcode, pt.state, pt.phone_ah, pt.phone_bh, pt.mobile, pt.dob, pt.medicareno, pt.member_no, pt.email, pt.fundcode, pt.birthplace, pt.vetaffno, pt.referalsrc, pt.mediexpry, pt.mcare_refn, pt.claimdtls, pt.nextofkin, pt.feepositn, pt.datejoined, pt.dvacardtyp, ptreg.famDrTitle, ptreg.famDrGiven, ptreg.famDrSurname, ptreg.famDrProviderNo, ptreg.famDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.famDrAdr1, ptreg.famDrAdr2, ptreg.famDrSuburb, ptreg.famDrState, ptreg.famDrPostCode, ptreg.refDrTitle, ptreg.refDrGiven, ptreg.refDrSurname, ptreg.refDrProviderNo, ptreg.refDrMedicareCenter, ptreg.refDrAdr1, ptreg.refDrAdr2, ptreg.refDrSuburb, ptreg.refDrState, ptreg.refDrPostCode, ptreg.nokGiven, ptreg.nokSUrname, ptreg.nokRelationship, ptreg.nokContactNo, ptreg.sigText, ptreg.base64ImageUrl, ptchar.midname as middleName, ptchar.agiven as preferedName from ptdetail pt left join ptdetail_reg ptreg on pt.patient_no = ptreg.patient_no left join ptcharacters ptchar on pt.patient_no = ptchar.patient_no left join x0152578 on x0152578.patient_no = pt.patient_no where x0152578.userid = :t_username and x0152578.password = :t_pass and ptreg.medicareno = :t_medicareno) wmTempTable
select report_dte,report_tme,srvcno,status,report_txt,mobileno,messageid,replymsgid,sms_inoout,msg_type,readinpp from ptsms where patient_no = :t_patientno and (msg_type = '' or msg_type = 'SMS')

select count(*) from (select report_dte,report_tme,srvcno,status,report_txt,mobileno,messageid,replymsgid,sms_inoout,msg_type,readinpp from ptsms where patient_no = :t_patientno and (msg_type = '' or msg_type = 'SMS')) wmTempTable
insert into ptdetail(patient_no,given,surname,email,medicareno,dob) values(:patient_no,:given,:surname,:email,:medicareno,:dob)
update x0152578 set password = :pass where patient_no = :patientno
update ptdetail set accountno = :t_accountNo where patient_no = :t_patientNo
SELECT e.*,bp.shortname,bp.longname, bp.blp_id FROM EduOpt e left JOIN BlpEduOpt b on e.idno=b.EduIdNum inner join blueprnt bp on b.blp_id = bp.blp_id
select count(*) from (SELECT e.*,bp.shortname,bp.longname, bp.blp_id FROM EduOpt e left JOIN BlpEduOpt b on e.idno=b.EduIdNum inner join blueprnt bp on b.blp_id = bp.blp_id) wmTempTable

insert into clinicalconclusions(conref,condate,concode,context,concat,patient_no,createdby,createdon,more_dtls) values (:t_conref,:t_condate,:t_concode,:t_context,:t_concat,:t_patient_no,:t_createdby,:t_createdon,:t_more_dtls)
select case when count(idno)>0 then 'true' else 'false' end as result from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid
select count(*) from (select case when count(idno)>0 then 'true' else 'false' end as result from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid) wmTempTable
update NoGenCon set NumValue = :nextNo, CurPreFix = :prefix where idCode = :t_idCode
select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid
select count(*) from (select patient_no from x0152578 where userid = :t_userid) wmTempTable

insert into account(accountno,acctype,tradeactyp,mainfile,mainfield,ac_name,accescode,contact,phone_ah,phone_bh,address1,address2,suburb,state,postcode) values(:t_accountno,'PATIENT','D','PTDETAIL','patient_no',:t_ac_name,:t_accescode,:t_contact,:t_phone_ah,:t_phone_bh,:t_address1,:t_address2,:t_suburb,:t_state,:t_postcode)
update ptcharacters set midname =:t_midname ,agiven = :t_preferredName where patient_no = :t_patientNo
